entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. 40 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h late this morning. High plus 4. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers early this evening. Otherwise clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High plus 5.
